node.title: Police closing in on alleged drug smuggler after raiding Sydney homes
node.description: NSW Police say they're closing in on alleged cocaine smuggler Mostafa Baluch after raiding two Sydney homes overnight.
node.content:
["NSW Police say they are\u00a0closing in on alleged cocaine smuggler Mostafa Baluch after raiding two Sydney homes overnight.", "The 33-year-old has been the subject of a national manhunt after allegedly cutting\u00a0a tracking device off his ankle on October 25, just days after he was granted bail.", "Yesterday, police raided two properties in Potts Hill and Yagoona and seized $250,000 in cash, 200 grams of cocaine, mobile phones, money counting machines and 458 grams of an \"unknown substance\".", "Detective Superintendent Rob Critchlow said the south-west Sydney homes, which were partly discovered by public tip-offs,\u00a0appeared to be \"safe houses for a syndicate\".", "\"We believe that these houses are linked to the person [we're] searching for and his associates,\" he said.", "\"What we're finding is [as] we're chasing this man to bring him back to justice, is that we're identifying a whole of criminal offences in a wider criminal group.\"", "", "
Mostafa Baluch has been on the run since October 25 after allegedly cutting off his ankle monitoring bracelet.(Supplied: Facebook)
", "One of the properties raided yesterday was empty except\u00a0for \"junk material\" and a single mattress.", "The second home had people residing in it.", "\"It was unfortunate we didn't find him last night, but we're pretty sure we're not far away,\" Detective Superintendent\u00a0Critchlow said.", "Mr Baluch is facing the possibility of a life sentence over an alleged attempt to import 900 kilograms of cocaine \u2014 with an estimated street value of $270 million \u2014 into Australia from Ecuador.", "Mr Baluch's disappearance came just four days after he was granted bail by Magistrate Michael Crompton, with his $4 million mansion overlooking Pittwater put up as surety.", "Police are looking at all properties linked to Mr Baluch and the origin of the funds used to purchase the safe houses.", "Detective Superintendent Critchlow said several people were being arrested as a result of the investigations and while it is unclear what role Mr Baluch played, evidence suggests he had a \"senior role\" in the wider criminal network.", "Last week, 34-year-old Sydney man Bennet Schwartz was charged with importing cocaine in consignments through air cargo, as part of a drug operation allegedly linked to Mr Baluch.", "A spokesperson for the Australian Federal Police (AFP) said Mr Schwartz was in contact with Mr Baluch before he went on the run, but did not provide any information on his whereabouts.", "Detective Superintendent Critchlow believed Mr Baluch\u00a0was still in Sydney but he \"wasn't assuming anything\" and would be working with interstate partners to detain him.", "\"We don't believe he has travelled overseas yet, but we are still quite certain he seeks to flee overseas,\" he said."]
